snippet: The Afghan president ordered that hundreds of millions of dollars in outstanding loans by the bank be repaid within two months.
abstract: Afghan Pres Hamid Karzai orders the appointment of a special prosecutor and creation of a special tribunal to try those involved in the near collapse of Kabul Bank; also demands that hundreds of millions of dollars in outstanding loans by the bank are repaid within two months.
lead_paragraph: The Afghan president ordered that hundreds of millions of dollars in outstanding loans by the bank be repaid within two months.

headline.seo: Karzai Orders Inquiry in Kabul Bank’s Losses
headline.main: Karzai Orders Prosecutor and Tribunal in Scandal Over Kabul Bank’s Losses
headline.print_headline: Karzai Orders Prosecutor and Tribunal in Scandal Over Kabul Bank’s Losses
